meanings.sent1: She was undemonstrative, rarely hugging or showing her emotions.
meanings.sent2: He remained undemonstrative even when he received good news.
meanings.sent3: The undemonstrative cat simply blinked when its owner returned home.
meanings.sent4: The old oak tree stood undemonstrative in the face of the storm, its roots firmly planted.
meanings.sent5: Her undemonstrative nature made it hard for others to know how she truly felt.

meanings.definition: Not showing or expressing feelings openly.
meanings.sent1: The undemonstrative student rarely spoke up in class, keeping his thoughts to himself.
meanings.sent2: She was undemonstrative about her disappointment, choosing to keep it to herself.
meanings.sent3: The undemonstrative robot simply carried out its tasks without any display of emotion.
meanings.sent4: The undemonstrative sky remained gray and silent, not revealing any hint of the impending storm.
meanings.sent5: His undemonstrative response to the news left everyone wondering what he truly thought.
